title: Save Me an Orange
description: In her debut poetry collection, Hayley gives voice to the roots of struggle and pain growing up, as well as the love and pursuit of self-acceptance that were fundamental in her own choice to live. Her verses weave a narrative that is both deeply personal and universally resonant–through shadows of the past and the fleeting moments of joy captured in the simplicity of sharing an orange.“even when you think there's nothing leftlife gives us orangesso go share one with your best friendmaybe they thought the world would endwhen they were 16 too.”-- from save me an orange
author: Hayley Grace
